pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, June 22, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, June 22, 2017:

Markham, Ontario

10:10 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chairman and CEO of General Motors, Mary Barra.

GM Canadian Technical Centre â€“ Markham Campus
101 McNabb Street
Markham, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity at beginning of the meeting
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.


Toronto, Ontario

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a conversation and Q&A with Peter Baker, Chief White House Correspondent, and Catherine Porter, Canada Bureau Chief, both of The New York Times.

Desautels Hall (Second Floor, South Building)
Rotman School of Management, University of Toronto
105 St George Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m. and present themselves to room 1050C
  • Please note that riser space is limited
  • A live broadcast of this event will be available on June 22 from 12:45 p.m. to 2:00 p.m. at: http://apps.rotman.utoronto.ca/liveatrotman/


Scarborough, Ontario

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will help prepare food baskets for Project Ramadan at the Muslim Welfare Centre.

Muslim Welfare Centre
100 McLevin Avenue
Scarborough, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 2:30 p.m.
